get.description: List all file services in storage accounts

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK -- List file services operation completed successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.description: Optional. Specified maximum number of shares that can be included in the list.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Optional. When specified, only share names starting with the filter will be listed.

200.description: OK -- List Shares operation completed successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets properties of a specified share.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: shareName
parameters.description: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK -- Get Share operation completed successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new share under the specified account as described by request body. The share resource includes metadata and properties for that share. It does not include a list of the files contained by the share.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: shareName
parameters.description: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

requestBody.description: Properties of the file share to create.

200.description: OK -- The Share is already created.

201.description: Created -- Create Share operation completed successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes specified share under its account.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: shareName
parameters.description: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK -- Delete Share operation completed successfully.

204.description: No Content -- The Share not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates share properties as specified in request body. Properties not mentioned in the request will not be changed. Update fails if the specified share does not already exist.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: shareName
parameters.description: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

requestBody.description: Properties to update for the file share.

200.description: OK -- Update Share operation completed successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the properties of file services in storage accounts, including CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: FileServicesName
parameters.description: The name of the file Service within the specified storage account. File Service Name must be "default"

200.description: OK -- returned the properties of a storage account’s File service.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Sets the properties of file services in storage accounts, including CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: FileServicesName
parameters.description: The name of the file Service within the specified storage account. File Service Name must be "default"

requestBody.description: The properties of file services in storage accounts, including CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) rules.

200.description: OK -- Sets The properties of a storage account’s File service successfully.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Storage service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Storage service.

corsRules.description: The List of CORS rules. You can include up to five CorsRule elements in the request.

allowedHeaders.description: Required if CorsRule element is present. A list of headers allowed to be part of the cross-origin request.

allowedMethods.description: Required if CorsRule element is present. A list of HTTP methods that are allowed to be executed by the origin.

allowedOrigins.description: Required if CorsRule element is present. A list of origin domains that will be allowed via CORS, or "*" to allow all domains

exposedHeaders.description: Required if CorsRule element is present. A list of response headers to expose to CORS clients.

maxAgeInSeconds.description: Required if CorsRule element is present. The number of seconds that the client/browser should cache a preflight response.

items.description: Specifies a CORS rule for the Blob service.

cors.description: Sets the CORS rules. You can include up to five CorsRule elements in the request.

days.description: Indicates the number of days that the deleted item should be retained. The minimum specified value can be 1 and the maximum value can be 365.

shareDeleteRetentionPolicy.description: The service properties for soft delete.

properties.description: The properties of File services in storage account.

name.description: The SKU name. Required for account creation; optional for update. Note that in older versions, SKU name was called accountType.

tier.description: The SKU tier. This is based on the SKU name.

sku.description: The SKU of the storage account.

FileServiceProperties.description: The properties of File services in storage account.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

FileShare.description: Properties of the file share, including Id, resource name, resource type, Etag.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager resource with an etag.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

FileShareItem.description: The file share properties be listed out.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a Azure Resource Manager resource with an etag.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

nextLink.description: Request URL that can be used to query next page of shares. Returned when total number of requested shares exceed maximum page size.

FileShareItems.description: Response schema. Contains list of shares returned, and if paging is requested or required, a URL to next page of shares.

lastModifiedTime.description: Returns the date and time the share was last modified.

metadata.description: A name-value pair to associate with the share as metadata.

shareQuota.description: The maximum size of the share, in gigabytes. Must be greater than 0, and less than or equal to 5TB (5120). For Large File Shares, the maximum size is 102400.

FileShareProperties.description: The properties of the file share.

FileServicesName.name: FileServicesName
FileServicesName.description: The name of the file Service within the specified storage account. File Service Name must be "default"

ShareName.name: shareName
ShareName.description: The name of the file share within the specified storage account. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.
